object_name.value: Validate selected document has next minor version

title.value: Used to check if document is having next minor version present or not. It is used in periodic review workflow to validate if next minor version already exists on top of major version.

repeating.value: OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution
''$value(object_name)'' with version ''$value(r_version_label)'' is not having next minor versions available.
dm_dbo.single_result_row_view where not exists (select r_object_id from cd_controlled_doc(all) where i_antecedent_id ='$value(r_object_id)')
